Entries.summer_10: @, hot days like this make me wonder what sleeping outside under the stars would be like...
Entries.funLeave_Penny: I'll be headed to town today, going to do some visiting.#$b#Might see how my mother's doing.

Entries.Mon4: @, you've got any interesting books you want to read?
Entries.1_2: I'd love to decorate more, but Mum doesn't approve.#$b#She thinks it's spending money we don't have.

Entries.patio_Penny: Just doing a little reading outside, %endearment. The weather is lovely today!

Entries.patio_Penny: Just enjoying a good book outside today, @!#$b#Is there anything that needs doing?

Entries.TwoKids_0: I can't wait to start teaching %kid1 and %kid2!$h
Entries.Good_0: To be honest, @, there's some days I'm still surprised that you picked me, of all the girls in town.#$b#I love you.
